Story_Main.para_1: We thank you for engaging us to provide services pertaining to your company secretarial matters. Our primary duty as your secretarial agent is to ensure that your company’s secretarial records are properly kept to comply with the requirements of the Companies Act, Cap. 50.
We would appreciate that all documents prepared by us to be checked to ensure that the contents therein are correct.

Cell.cell_c: Incorporation of private limited company (this includes standard M&A, common seal, minute book and share certificates)
Secretarial fee, first year (startup discount 50% off usual price)
Nominee Director (Optional -- only if all founders are not resident in Singapore and do not have a local friend willing to perform this service.)
$3,600 per year billed in advance; subject to separate contract and letter of indemnity
Disbursements and out-of-pocket expenses such as filing fees with ACRA, stamp duties paid on transfer of shares, transport, photocopy charges and postages will be billed separately.

Story_Main.para_1: Our engagement will continue from year to year unless terminated, amended, or superseded in writing.
Yours faithfully, For and on behalf of Prima Management Services Pte. Ltd.
We, the promoters of the Company, hereby confirm our agreement to the terms of engagement stated above.
